arts.ttl: Ryan Mason kicks off West Brom tenure with winning start and Charlton clinch win over Watford
arts.sum: Stoke defeated Derby and Millwall triumphed over Norwich in EFL Championship

arts.ttl: Charlton strike in stoppage-time to beat Watford
arts.sum: Summer signing Harvey Knibbs scored a stoppage-time winner for Charlton as the Championship new boys made it a losing start for new Watford head coach Paulo Pezzolano.
